text: organizations that operate in highly
regulated industries or the public
sector often need to control whether
customer data is stored and processed a
concept known as data residency customer
data is the personal data uploaded to
aws services under their aws accounts
this is important for the security of
their customer data and for maintaining
customer trust however it can be
difficult and time consuming to
understand interpret and implement the
right set of controls establishing data
residency just got easier aws control
tower lets you implement preventive and
detective data residency guardrails to
help you restrict customer data and
workloads to the aws regions you select
simplify data and resource management
select the guard rails you want and
easily implement data residency controls
with aws control tower you can set up
your aws environment and data residency
guardrails in minutes
start operating in the cloud more easily
today learn more at our website
